text: Wake up privacy policy
Update date: June 29, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Shenzhen Facemeng Technology Co., Ltd. and its related parties (referred to as "we" or "company") as operators of awakening pictures know the importance of personal information to you. We will protect your individuals in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulationsInformation and privacy security.

We formulate this "Wake -ups Privacy Policy" (referred to as "this privacy policy") and special reminders: I hope you can read and understand the privacy policy carefully before using the wake -up map and related services to make appropriate choices.
This privacy policy will help you understand:

We will follow your information to collect and use your information, but we will not collect personal information in a package of compulsory binding because you agree with your consent of this privacy policy.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: When you use or open related functions or use services, we will collect and use relevant information for the implementation of functions and services.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: Unless it is necessary to realize business functions or necessary information that necessary in accordance with laws and regulations, you can refuse to provide and not affect other functions or services.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: We will explain the information we want to collect in the privacy policy.

When you use wake -up pictures for pictures/video editing, beautification, pictures repair, templates, login, sharing and other services, we may be based on legal requirements or implementation functions. We may be sensitiveInformation is collected or treated locally.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use wake -up pictures for pictures/video editing, beautification and other services, we may collect or handle personal sensitive information such as your picture/audio and video files, facial recognition features, and other personal sensitive information.

text: You have the right to refuse to authorize this information or withdraw your authorization of this information.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You have the right to refuse to authorize or withdraw authorization of personal sensitive information such as picture/audio and video files and facial recognition features.

text: Please understand, refusing or withdrawing the authorization consent will cause you to be unable to use relevant features, but it does not affect other services that use your normally using the wake -up map.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Rejection or withdrawal of authorization will cause you to be unable to use related specific functions, but does not affect the use of other functions.

text: When you fully read and agree to this privacy policy and the "Wake -up User Agreement", it means that you have agreed to accept all the functional services of the wake -up map.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: When you fully read and agree to this privacy policy and the "Wake -up User Agreement" means you have agreed to accept all functional services.

text: If you only want to use the basic functional service of the awakening map, you can close the "personalized content recommendation" to enter the basic function mode before the first time you agree to the "Wake Picture" personal information protection guidance.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can close the "personalized content recommendation" to enter the basic functional mode at the same time before the first time he agrees with the "wake -up" personal information protection guidance.

text: Other value -added function services, we will pop up a separate pop -up window to remind you, and only provide you with the consent of your authorization and collect relevant necessary information;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will only provide other value -added services and collect relevant necessary information after obtaining your separate authorization consent.

text: Please note that after you make a separate authorization consent (including but not limited to your active login of the wake -up map, authorized use of special beautification tools, special effects gameplay, etc.), the basic function mode will be automatically exited into the general mode.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: Your individual consent of any value -added service will lead to automatic entering the general mode.

text: If you do not log in to the account, we will ensure the basic functions of information push through the identifier information corresponding to the device.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not log in to the account, we will use the device identifier information guarantee information push function.

text: If you log in to your account, we will push information based on your account information.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: If you log in to your account, we will push information according to account information.

text: The camera (camera) and album (storage) permissions will not be opened by default. Only after your explicit authorization will be used when you implement specific functions or services, you can also withdraw authorization.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: The camera (camera) and album (storage) permissions can only be used only by your explicit authorization and can be withdrawn.

text: In particular, it is necessary to point out that even after your authorization, we have obtained these sensitive permissions, and we will not collect your information when related functions or services are not needed.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: We have obtained the camera (camera), album (storage) permissions, and only collect your information only when related functions or services are required.

text: Explanation and usage instructions for wake -up graphs

This privacy policy is suitable for your mobile Internet application, PC -end/web application, official website, third -party websites and applications for mobile Internet applications, "Awakening" through the name "Awakening Picture" and may include "wake -up maps" related to third -party websites.Software Development Tool Pack (SDK) and application programming interface (API) method to access and use "wake -up" products and related services.
The following will help you understand how we collect, use, store, transfer (as applicable) and protect personal information;
Help you understand the way to check, copy, correct, delete, and withdraw authorization of personal information.

This policy is closely related to your service relationship. We recommend that you read and understand all the contents of this policy, make a proper choice you think, and the important content of your personal information rights and interests.Essence
1. How do we collect and use personal information
2. How do we use cookie equivalent technologies
3. How do we share, transfer, and publicly disclose personal information
4. How do we store personal information
5. How can we protect the security of personal information
6. Personalized recommendation
7. Manage your personal information
8. Terms of minors
9. Amendment and Notice of Privacy Policy
10. Scope of application
11. Contact us
1. How do we collect and use personal information
We will collect the information you actively provided when using the service, and collect the information you generated during the use of function or accepting service through automation:
label: Important
Edit/Control

text: 1.2 Safe in the normally and run safely
1.2.1 Operation and Security
We are committed to providing you with a safe, credible product and use environment, and providing high -quality and reliable services and information is our core goal.

Please understand that in order to maintain the normal operation of our services and protect the legitimate interests of you or other users or the public from losses, we will collect the necessary information for the safe and stable operation of products or services.
label: Data Security
First Party Collection Information

text: In addition, wake -up maps will not collect any other personal sensitive information in your background running in the background.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In the silent state and/or in the background running process, no other personal sensitive information of you will be collected.

text: 1.2.2 Equipment information and log information

(1) When you use wake -up maps and related services, in order to ensure the quality and efficiency of software and services, we will collect your hardware models, operating system versions, and equipment logo (Androidid, OAID, OAID, OAID, GAID, hardware serial number, iOS such as IDFV, IDFA), WLAN access points (SSID, BSSID), Bluetooth, base station, network device hardware address (MAC), IP address, software version number, network access modeAnd type, status, network quality data, operation, use, service log information and sensor information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: Collect your hardware model, operating system version number, equipment identifier, network basic information, service log information, and sensor information to ensure the safe operation of software and services.

text: (2) In order to help us better understand the operation of wake -up maps and related services. At the same time, in order to prevent malicious procedures and ensure the quality and efficiency of operating operations, we will record the network log, collect the application information or the process information and application that is being running.The overall operation, usage and frequency of use, frequency, application crash, overall installation usage, performance data, and source of application.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: Record network logs, collect and install application information or process information, the overall operation of the application, and use information to understand the operation of the product or service, prevent malicious procedures, and ensure the quality and efficiency of operation.

text: (3) We may use your account information, equipment information, service log information, as well as the information that our affiliates and partners are obtained or provided by your authorization or provided by law to judge the security of accounts and transactions, conduct authentication, identify violations of laws and regulations illegal regulationsSituation, testing and preventing safety incidents, and adopting necessary records, analysis, and disposal measures in accordance with the law.
label: Important
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: Use your account information, equipment information, service log information, and other information you authorized to judge accounts and transaction security, conduct authentication, identify illegal violations, test and prevent security incidents.

text: 1.3 Photo/audio and video beautification, editing and other general functions
Wake pictures provide you with photos/video editing, beautification, filter, pictures, etc., and support media file download/save to local/sharing and other general functions and services.

In order to achieve these functions and services, we need to obtain the camera (camera) and album permissions (storage). These permissions are sensitive permissions. We will only obtain such permissions after you authorize.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: Get your authorized camera (camera) and album permissions (storage) to achieve general functions such as photos/audio and video beautification and editing.

text: If you refuse to authorize certain necessary permissions, you will not be able to use the corresponding function, but it does not affect your normal use of other services.
label: Permission Acquisition

text: 1.4 Provide unique features such as personalized beautification tools, map repair templates and other features
Provide a personalized picture, video aesthetic tools (filters, beauty, beauty, etc.), map fixing templates, etc. are the core functions and services of awakening pictures.
To achieve these functions and services, we may collect and use the following information:
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We may collect and use your face to achieve special features such as landscaping tools, map repair templates.

text: (1) Face recognition information

a. When you choose to use some beautification tools and feedback templates that need to be adjusted or feedback based on facial recognition information, in order to provide a better functional experience and display effect, we need to identify and handle your facial features on the local client.The information is used for rendering effects. We will not transmit this information to the server, will not store any form of storage, and will not use this information to any other purposes other than this.Three parties;
label: Data Retention
Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you choose to use beautification tools and trimming templates, we need to identify and process your facial feature information on the local client, but will not return this information to the server or store or use it as other purposes, let alone provide it.

text: b. When you choose to use some creative functions, special effects gameplay (including but not limited to "portrait intelligent matting", "map intelligent matting", "intelligent cutout template", "intelligent recommendation template", etc.)In order to achieve image processing and facial effect optimization faster and accurately, we need to temporarily upload media information such as pictures and videos that you choose to process to optimize the effect.
label: Data Retention
Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: The media information you uploaded will only be used to optimize images, video processing and/or effect optimization through specific creative functions and special effects.Forms of storage will not be provided to third parties.
label: Data Retention
Important
Usage
rewrite: We will not store any form of media information or use it for other purposes, let alone provide it.

text: After completing the relevant function processing and returning the effect content to you, we will immediately delete the relevant pictures, videos and other media information and all information involved from the server.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: We will delete all information after completing the relevant function processing of the media data you uploaded and return the effect content.

text: We will authorize the special features that need to upload media information to the server for the effect optimization processing. If you refuse to authorize, it will only make you unable to use specific functions, but it does not affect other services that use your normally use.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important

text: We will not use it for any other purposes other than that, nor do it store any form of storage, let alone provide it to third parties.

text: We will authorize the special features that need to upload media information to the server for the effect optimization processing. If you refuse to authorize, it will only make you unable to use specific functions, but it does not affect other services that use your normally use.

2. How do we use cookie equivalent technologies
Similar technologies such as Cookie and Equipment Information Makes are commonly used in the Internet.

When you use a wake -up and related services, we may use related technologies to send one or more cookies to your device, or anonymous identifiers to collect and identify the information when you access and use this product.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect information through cookies or anonymous identifiers, identify the information when you access and use the product.

text: We promise that cookies will not be used for any other purposes other than the purpose of this privacy policy.
We use cookies and similar technologies to achieve the following functions or services:
2.1 Guarantee of the safety and efficient operation of products and services
label: Usage

text: We may set up Cookie, or an anonymous identifier that guarantees security, so that we can confirm whether you log in to the service safely, or whether you encounter stolen, fraud and other illegal acts.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: To confirm whether you log in safely through cookie or anonymous identifiers, or whether you encounter stolen, fraud and other illegal acts.

text: These technologies also help us improve service efficiency, improve login and response speed.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Cookie or anonymous identifiers can help improve service efficiency, improve login and response speed.

text: 2.2 Help you get a easier access experience
label: Usage

text: Using this kind of technology can also help you save you to fill in your personal information, repeat the individual picture/audio and video aesthetic tools, photo template functions (such as: record filter settings, etc.), steps to enter search contentAnd process (example: record search, etc.) to help you get a easier access experience.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: By using cookie or anonymous identifiers, you can help you repeat the information, the steps and processes of repeated selection functions.

text: 2.3 COOKIE Clear
Most browsers provide users with the function of removing browser cache data. You can perform the corresponding data clearance operation in the browser settings function.
label: Important
Edit/Control

text: 5. How can we protect the security of personal information

(1) We attach great importance to your personal information security, and we will strive to take reasonable security measures (including technical and management) to protect your personal information and prevent your personal information from being used in improperly or in unauthorized situations.It was interviewed, publicly disclosed, used, modified, damaged, lost or leaked.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will take technical and management security measures to prevent your personal information from being improperly used or unauthorized access, publicly disclosed, used, modified, etc.

text: (2) We will use the encryption technology, anonymous treatment, and related reasonable and feasible methods that are not lower than industry peers to protect your personal information, and use a security protection mechanism to prevent your personal information from being maliciously attacked.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will use encrypted technology, anonymous processing and other means to protect your personal information and prevent your personal information from being maliciously attacked.

text: (3) We will establish a special security department, security management system, and data security process to ensure your personal information security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will establish security departments, systems, and processes to ensure your personal information security.

text: We adopt strict data use and access systems to ensure that only authorized personnel can access your personal information and conduct security audits of data and technology in a timely manner.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We adopt the data usage and access system to ensure that your personal information is authorized and conducts security audit on data and technology.

text: (4) Although the above -mentioned reasonable and effective measures have been taken and the standards required by relevant legal regulations have been adopted, please understand that due to the technical restrictions and various malicious means that there may beSecurity measures cannot always ensure that the information is 100 % security. We will try our best to ensure the security of our personal information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Although there are security measures, it is impossible to fully guarantee that there is no security problem.

text: (5) You know and understand that the system and communication network you used to access our services may have problems due to factors outside the control scope.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Systems and communication networks may have problems due to unprepared factors.

text: Therefore, we strongly recommend that you take positive measures to protect the security of personal information, including but not limited to the use of complex passwords, regularly modify the password, do not disclose your account password and related personal information to others.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: It is recommended that you take positive measures to protect the security of personal information, including the use of complex passwords, regularly modify passwords, account passwords confidential.

text: (6) We will develop an emergency treatment plan and immediately start the emergency plan when the user information security incident occurs, and strive to prevent the impact and consequences of these security events expand.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will start emergency plans to deal with information security incidents.

text: Once the user information security incident (leaked and lost) occurs, we will inform you in a timely manner in accordance with the requirements of the laws and regulations: the basic situation and possible impact of security incidents, the disposal measures we have taken or we will takeAnd reducing risk suggestions, remedy measures for you.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will inform your basic situation, possible impact, disposal measures, independent prevention suggestions, etc.

text: We will promptly inform you of the incident -related situation with push notifications, emails, letters, text messages, and related forms. When it is difficult to inform them one by one, we will publish a reasonable and effective way.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The relevant situation of security incidents will be informed by mail, letter, telephone, push notification, etc. When it is difficult to inform one by one, it will issue an announcement.

text: At the same time, we will also report to the disposal of user information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the relevant regulatory authorities.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The disposal of personal information security incidents will be reported in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.

text: (7) Once you leave the wake -up map and related services, browse or use other websites, services and content resources, we will not be able to protect your personal information submitted by software and website in other services outside the awakening map and related services.Whether you log in to, browse or use the above software, or whether the website is based on the link or guidance of the wake -up map.

Data Security
Risk
